title: T206's For Sale......Poor to Good - Lot is Sold
author: cincyredlegs

posts.post_title: T206's For Sale......Poor to Good - Lot is Sold
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is 61 poor T206's.  These are pretty well worn but are still T206's.  Most cards are creased and have back damaged.  Would like to sell as a lot first.  Looking to get SOLD delivered for the lot via paypal gift.  Let me know if you have any questions.

[IMG]http://i674.photobucket.com/albums/vv101/hooksm1/Poor_zpsc4gl4vaz.jpeg[/IMG]

Mark

If you look to break up into smaller lots, I'd be very interested.

Thanks-Brian
